isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 2000 4000 and 8000 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - SPEEDOMETER/TACHOMETER, GAUGES AND WARNING LIGHTS - 9800 - DESCRIPTION - ALARM

svcproc.title: ALARM
svcproc.para: A single electronically driven alarm is mounted on the circuit breaker board. The alarm is a replaceable item. The alarm will sound, reporting out-of-range conditions.

item.para: Low air pressure - this alarm sounds continuously when the pressure in either the primary or secondary air reservoir is lower than 76 PSI (524 KPa) and remains ON as long as the condition is present.
Power Divider Lock - This alarm is optional, and if installed, sounds continuously as long as the PDL is engaged.
